column3: Let's see what travis' network-hdd says

This is failing on travis because the `mine_large_blocks()` is creating blocks with too-old timestamps. This only becomes apparent when running the test on slow systems. I have a fix i the branch here: https://github.com/jnewbery/bitcoin/tree/2019-04-fix-feature-pruning. Feel free to take that commit for this PR.
